name: Plunderr (Tobanka)
description:
This is my first game! It's a roguelite pirate-themed deckbuilder. There's no final objective yet, just exploring the map and collecting cards/ items. There are several biomes, each with unique encounters, card sets, and items that increase in difficulty as you head towards the top of the map (Reef, Deep Sea, Citadel, Arctic, Midnight).

I'm still figuring things out, so feel free to leave any feedback.

Useful keybinds:

A/D to roll up/out the map

CTRL during battles to see what order cards will go in

Clicking on prize wheels will spin them

Clicking on coins will flip them

Cheat keybinds:

W - Win

S - Open shop

ESC - Exits any room

I originally had this listed separately as a prototype, but it's changed a lot since then and I haven't updated it in forever so I moved it to this page.
